column2:
"The atmosphere here feels heavy.
I wonder what they're up to..."

"You two!
State your business!"

"You're a new face around here...
Are you one of the King's minions?"

"You're not from here...
Who are you?"

"Look!
We're not your enemies!"

"This small thing can talk!?
What the hell is it!?"

"Eh!?
So someone like me isn't normal
around here!! Ugh, what are we
going to do?"
"What's with all the noise?"
"Oh, Lady Harriet!"

"I apologize for the disturbance,
but we found these suspicious
individuals looming around here,
so we were about to detain them..."
"Suspicious invidiuals?"
"IT'S YOU!"

"You can't, Lady Harriet!
These are dangerous individuals,
please restrain yourself!"

"Why would they be dangerous?
These are my guests."

"Guests!? Those two?
But considering the situation..."

"Valna, as my Adjutant,
I thank you for your concerns."

"But it's alright.
I will handle it from here."
"Understood."

"Please call for me if you're in need
of assistance. I'll be there in a
hurry."
"Thank you, Valna."
"Please, follow me."

"This is my personal tent.
No one will come here unannounced."

"Do you remember me, <%me>?
You've saved my life the other day."

"Please, allow me to introduce myself
once more. My name is Harriet."

"<%me>.
I know this may sound impolite.
But please, I must know."

"Do you know who we, this country...
Rather, are you familiar with this
world?"
"1. I don't know"
"2. Pretend you do"

"We shouldn't tell them what we know
<%me>.
Let's just go along as if we do not
know anything of this world."
"Just as I thought... "

"Strange clothing...
Not familiar with who we are,
but possess awesome power..."

"There's no doubt about it! You're
just as the legends say! I've
waited so long for your arrival..."
"What's this legend you speak of?"
"That's..."

"Hey! Why does it sound like it's
getting too rowdy out there?"
"M'lady Harriet!"
"You may enter."

"The King's Mages have arrived.
They've started a summon!"

"..!! Are they trying to summon a
Devil Castle!?"

"We must defeat them before they're
able to complete the summon.
Valna, rally our troops and head out!"

"Wait, you musn't Lady Harriet.
Please, let's retreat, for your
own safety!"

"If we run away now, they'll hunt us
for days, all the way into our domain!
If that happens, it's all over."

"Besides, I cannot retreat knowing
all the while my troops are out there,
giving up their lives."
"Lady Harriet..."

"We'll break through them without
delay and be victorious.
Valna, please make haste and rally
our troops."

"I apologize... I must join the
battle as well. If we make it out
alive, I will explain everything."

"Hey!
What are we going to do now,
<%me>?"
"1. It goes without saying..."
"2. What do you think?"

"Of course I knew that!
You didn't have to remind me,
<%me>!"
"Are you worried about me...?"

"But it's alright. I know that
<%me> is the type
of person who will need support!"

"So let's go, and head to where
Harriet is at!"
"Soldier"
